hackathon-description-text: If you missed it last year, the way we do Battle of the Hacks is different from other hackathons you might have been part of. We bring together the 14 top university hackathon organizers in North America. Each puts together a team of their four top engineers. These four-person teams compete for votes from the judging panel, and ultimately the $25,000 sponsorship we put up for a hackathon to be hosted at the winning school.
hackathon-rules: All contributing code must be written at the hackathon, during the hackathon. No pre-exisiting code will be allowed.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2875 Sand Hill Rd, Menlo Park, CA 94025, USA
hackathon-location-address: 2875 Sand Hill Rd, Menlo Park, CA 94025, USA
hackathon-description-header: Join organizers from the top college hackathons!
